entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Maybe @PressSec can weigh in on this: You're requiring attendees to sign away rights to civil suit if they contract COVID-19 while at your rallies. Have you also required this of your campaign staff and of the event forum employees who have to work these "rallies?"
